channel.title: MITgcm on Zelun's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in MITgcm on Zelun's Notebook

item.title: 01 - How to Install MITgcm dependencis
item.description: MITgcm requires at least one complier: c language compiler. The most common complier in Unix based OS is gcc. Other dependencies are netcdf-c, ifort etc. Install Dependencies in MacOS Install homebrew. You can download the clang/gcc source code and compile it by yourself, which may give you more freedom to specify the install rootdir. However, one easier wat I suggest is to use homebrew to install such dependencies but not compile them by yourself.
